description.en: The course introduces the concepts in pedagogy, the problems of didactics, the theories of education, the principles of arranging pedagogical process and planning the study; the role of pedagogue (properties, purification, communication skills); methods of learning and teaching; the history of pedagogy; educational system and adjustment.
description.et: Kursus tutvustab üliõpilastele pedagoogika üldaluseid ja teooriaid, annab ülevaate pedagoogika ajaloost, pedagoogi rollist (omadused, kompententsid, suhtlemisoskused); tutvustab õppimise ja õpetamise meetodeid; haridussüstemi ja vastavat seadusandlust.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give an overview of:
* the main concepts in pedagogy and didactics, basis and theories;
objectives.et: 1) pedagoogika ja kasvatusteaduste põhiprobleemidest, üldalustest ja teooriatest;

objectives.en: * the conditions, the influences and the problems of education;

learning_outcomes.en:
Student knows the concepts and the principles of pedagogy and education.
* Student knows the history of education and different approaches.
* Student understands the role of pedagogue.
* Student knows an educational adjustments.
